page.title: 05RECREATION AND LEISURE
page.content: {RECREATION AND LEISURE} There are beaches, cliff walks and country walks in this area for people to enjoy. Eyemouth has an indoor swimming pool, a cinema which seats 200, a bowling club, golf club, tennis club, sub-aqua club, breakdance club and squash club. Boat trips can be arranged, and permits are available for fresh water fishing. These pastimes are enjoyed by tourists and locals. Other popular pastimes among local men are going to the local pub or brewing beer at home, watching tv, gardening and D.I.Y. Women enjoy bingo, gardening, cooking, knitting and sewing. An example of local sewing is to be seen in the form of a tapestry commemorating the fishing disaster of 1881. It was completed in 1981 and is on display in Eyemouth Museum.
